description: TwingateConnector represents a Connector in Twingate.

spec.description: TwingateConnectorSpec defines the desired state of TwingateConnector

containerExtra.description: Extra container configuration for the Connector Deployment's pod template at `.spec.template.spec.containers`.

hasStatusNotificationsEnabled.description: Enable status notifications for the Connector.

image.description: Image defines the image to use for the Connector.

repository.description: Repository to use for the Connector.

tag.description: Tag to use for the Connector.

imagePolicy.description: ImagePolicy defines the image to use for the Connector and a schedule to keep it up to date.

provider.description:
Provider determines how the operator looks for a new connector version.
  * dockerhub: Check Twingate's official DockerHub repository (`twingate/connector`) for new tags.
  * google: Check Google Container Registry specified by the `repository` value for new tags.

repository.description: Repository to use for pod's image.

schedule.description: Cron schedule to check for new versions.

version.description: Semver version specifier (ex: '^1.0.0'). Uses NPM spec: https://github.com/npm/node-semver#ranges

logLevel.description: Log level for the Connector (-1 to 7: -1 for no logs, 0 - least verbose, 7 - most verbose, default: 3).

name.description: Name of the Connector (optional, if not specified Twingate will give a random name)

podAnnotations.description: Extra annotations to add to the Connector Deployment's pod template at `.spec.template.metadata.annotations`.

podExtra.description: Extra pod configuration to be added to the Connector Deployment's pod template at `.spec.template.spec`

podLabels.description: Extra labels to add to the Connector Deployment's pod template at `.spec.template.metadata.labels`.

sidecarContainers.description: SidecarContainers allows injecting additional containers to the Connector Pod.

x-kubernetes-validations.message: Can define either `image` or `imagePolicy`, not both.
